description._content: ID: or_2933_f95v Title: An abridged version of Khusrau u Shirin by Nizami. Sixty-three miniatures. Illustrator: "Anon (Anon)" Provenance: 1726 Caption: Buzurjumid leading the funeral procession accompanied by water-sprinklers and men giving coins to bystanders. Notes: Opaque watercolour. Mughal style. Source identifier: Or.2933 f.95v British Library Shelfmark: Or.2933 If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of this image, please place an order at Images Online imagesonline.bl.uk.
